程序包 org.apache.giraph.comm.aggregators

Package for classes which are used to handle aggregators.

请参阅: 说明

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    WorkerAggregatorRequestProcessor
    Aggregates worker aggregator requests and sends them off
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AggregatedValueOutputStream
    Implementation of CountingOutputStream which allows writing of aggregator values in the form of pair (name, value)
    AggregatorOutputStream
    Implementation of CountingOutputStream which allows writing of aggregators in the form of triple (name, classname, value)
    AggregatorUtils
    Class for aggregator constants and utility methods
    AllAggregatorServerData
    Accepts aggregators and their values from previous superstep from master and workers which own aggregators.
    CountingCache
    Cache which counts the number of flushes per task id (destination worker id), so we know how many requests were sent to the worker
    CountingOutputStream
    Wrapper for output stream which keeps the place in the beginning for the count of objects which were written to it
    OwnerAggregatorServerData
    Class for holding aggregators which current worker owns, and aggregating partial aggregator values from workers.
    SendAggregatedValueCache
    Takes and serializes aggregated values and keeps them grouped by owner partition id, to be sent in bulk.
    SendAggregatorCache
    Takes and serializes aggregators and keeps them grouped by owner partition id, to be sent in bulk.
